name: Customer Addresses And Contacts
query:
SELECT
	`tabCustomer`.name as "Customer ID:Link/Customer",
	`tabCustomer`.customer_name as "Customer Name",
	`tabCustomer`.customer_group as "Customer Group:Link/Customer Group",
	`tabAddress`.address_line1 as "Address Line 1",
	`tabAddress`.address_line2 as "Address Line 2",
	`tabAddress`.city as "City",
	`tabAddress`.state as "State",
	`tabAddress`.pincode as "Postal Code",
	`tabAddress`.country as "Country",
	`tabAddress`.is_primary_address as "Is Primary Address:Check", 
	`tabContact`.first_name as "First Name",
	`tabContact`.last_name as "Last Name",
	`tabContact`.phone as "Phone",
	`tabContact`.mobile_no as "Mobile No",
	`tabContact`.email_id as "Email Id",
	`tabContact`.is_primary_contact as "Is Primary Contact:Check"
FROM
	`tabCustomer`
	left join `tabAddress` on (
		`tabAddress`.customer=`tabCustomer`.name
	)
	left join `tabContact` on (
		`tabContact`.customer=`tabCustomer`.name
	)
WHERE
	`tabCustomer`.docstatus<2
ORDER BY
	`tabCustomer`.name asc
